story.heading: DEAR FRIENDS AND FAMILY
story.text: YOU PRESENCE AT OUR WEDDING IS THE GREATEST GIFT OF ALL. THERE IS NOTHING BETTER THAN ENJOYING THE ITALIAN SUN, SURROUNDED BY VINEYARDS AND THE WONDERFUL COMPANY OF THOSE DEAREST TO US.

accommodation.title: ACCOMMODATION
accommodation.description: We will be staying at Podere Montale, surrounded by olive trees and vineyards. We chose a place that represents us, since we love nature and we think will allow us to forgot about the rest and fully enjoy the wedding day.
accommodation.latestUpdateValue: YOU'LL FIND OUT ABOUT THE ROOM ARRANGEMENTS WHEN YOU ARRIVE

plane.title: ARRIVING BY PLANE
plane.description: For whoever decide to come by plane, we're happy to reimburse €100 per person for flights if desired.
plane.airportsLazioValue:
- ROME FIUMICINO, "LEONARDO DA VINCI" 
- ROME CIAMPINO, "G.B. PASTINE"

transfer.title: HOW TO GET THERE
transfer.description: We're here to help you get to the venue. Choose between organized transport or the freedom of a road trip.
transfer.durationValue:
- 2 HRS 50 MIN FROM ROME FIUMICINO 
 - 2 HRS 35 MIN FROM ROME CIAMPINO
 - 2 HRS 15 MIN FROM FLORENCE
 - 2 HRS 25 MIN FROM PISA
transfer.busValue: A TRANSFER CAN BE MADE AVAILABLE FROM BOTH ROME AND FLORENCE BASED ON THE AMOUNT OF PEOPLE THAT NEED IT. PLEASE LET US KNOW IF YOU'D LIKE TO MAKE USE OF IT
transfer.carValue: IF YOU'D PREFER TO MAKE A LONGER TRIP OUT OF IT, WE RECOMMEND RENTING A CAR AND EXPLORING THE SURROUNDINGS. AT THE VENUE THERE IS ENOUGH PARKING SPACE

schedule.title: WEEKEND SCHEDULE
schedule.description:
There will be plenty of food, snacks, drinks, and water available throughout the weekend. If you have any special requests or dietary needs, please let us know in advance so we can arrange them.

If you'd like to pick up something yourself, the nearest supermarket is in Castel del Piano, a small village about 12km from Podere Montale.

thursday.whatValue: LATER IN THE DAY, WE'LL ENJOY A WINE TASTING

friday.detailsValue: FROM 6:00 PM, WE'LL HAVE AN APERITVO TO OFFICIALLY START THE WEEKEND

saturday.whenValue:
- TIME BREAKFAST "TBD" 
- TIME LUNCH "TBD" 
- TIME CEREMONY "TBD" 
- TIME DINNER "TBD"
saturday.detailsValue: ONCE THE CEREMONY ENDS, WE'LL RAISE A GLASS (OR TWO), ENJOY A LOVELY DINNER, AND DANCE INTO THE NIGHT.

sunday.detailsValue: WE'LL HAVE A FAREWELL BREAKFAST BEFORE CHECKING-OUT AND SAYING OUR GOODBYES

perks.heading: PERKS
perks.text: WE CAN ALSO ENJOY THE BEAUTIFUL POOL AND THE WINERY DURING THE WEEKEND.

dontForget.label: DON'T FORGET TO BRING
dontForget.text: Sunscreen, Mosquito repellent, Swimwear and towels, A light sweater or scarf for the evenings.
dontForget.kids: Make sure to bring everything your kids might need, it can get quite warm in July. We'll make sure there's plenty of shade and activities to keep them happy and comfortable.

quiz.label: FUN FACT QUIZ
quiz.title:
HOW MUCH DO YOU KNOW
ABOUT SIMONE AND VITA?

questions.question: WHAT NICKNAME DID VITA USE FOR SIMONE AT THE BEGINNING OF THEIR RELATIONSHIP?
questions.answer: Campari. Simone drinks a lot of Campari.

questions.question: WHERE DID THEY MEET?
questions.answer: In the basement of A'DAM tower in Amsterdam: club Shelter

questions.question: WHAT DID THEY EAT THE FIRST NIGHT AFTER GETTING THE KEYS OF THEIR CURRENT APARTMENT?
questions.answer: They improvised a carbonara, and eat it while seating on the floor (since there was no furniture at all).

questions.question: WHAT'S ONE RITUAL THAT THEY HAVE AT THE END OF SUMMER?
HOW MANY TIMES DOES SIMONE INTERRUPT A MOVIE/CONVERSATION TO SPIT A RANDOM FACT ABOUT ANCIENT/SCIENTIFIC THINGS?
WHAT IS THE "ANTIKYTHERA"?
questions.answer: It's an ancient Greek artifact, often called the world's first computer, used to predict astronomical positions and eclipses.

registry.label:
PLEASE CLICK HERE BELOW AND LET US KNOW
IF WE'LL SEE YOU THERE ON 03.07.2026
registry.buttonYes: I'm definitely going to be there
registry.buttonNo: Unfortunately, I have to miss it
registry.email: For any further question you can email us anytime at

yes.label: WE ARE SO EXCITED!
yes.title: CAN'T WAIT TO CELEBRATE WITH YOU

no.label: WE WILL MISS YOU
no.title: THANK YOU FOR LETTING US KNOW

form.name: NAMES OF ATTENDEES
form.travelPlaneVoucher: I'm coming by plane, and your 100 € travel voucher would really help
form.travelPlaneNoVoucher: I'm coming by plane, but I won't need the travel voucher. I truly appreciate the offer!

email.subjectYes: We are Coming! Count Us In for the Big Day!
email.bodyYesIntro: here. We're so excited to celebrate with you! We'll be there with
email.bodyYesDietary: Just a heads up on dietary needs:
email.bodyYesClosing:
Can't wait for the big day!

Many hugs,
email.bodyNoIntro: I'm so sorry but I won't be able to make it to your wedding. I really wish I could be there to celebrate with you both!
email.bodyNoClosing:
Wishing you all the happiness in the world on your special day and beyond.

Many hugs,
